title: Solarized Arc
description: A sophisticated theme based on the classic Solarized palette with modern Arc design elements
css: :root { --solarized-base03: #002b36; --solarized-base02: #073642; --solarized-base01: #586e75; --solarized-base00: #657b83; --solarized-base0: #839496; --solarized-base1: #93a1a1; --solarized-base2: #eee8d5; --solarized-base3: #fdf6e3; --solarized-blue: #268bd2; --solarized-cyan: #2aa198; --solarized-green: #859900; --solarized-yellow: #b58900; --solarized-orange: #cb4b16; --solarized-red: #dc322f; --solarized-magenta: #d33682; --solarized-violet: #6c71c4; } body { background: var(--solarized-base03) !important; color: var(--solarized-base0) !important; font-family: 'Source Code Pro', monospace; line-height: 1.6; } .bg-white, [data-testid='thread-content'] { background: var(--solarized-base02) !important; border: 1px solid var(--solarized-base01); border-radius: 4px; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); } .text-gray-900, .text-black { color: var(--solarized-base1) !important; } .text-gray-600, .text-gray-500 { color: var(--solarized-base00) !important; } .border-gray-200, .border-gray-300 { border-color: var(--solarized-base01) !important; } .hover\:bg-gray-50:hover, .hover\:bg-gray-100:hover { background: var(--solarized-base02) !important; } a, .text-blue-600 { color: var(--solarized-blue) !important; } button { background: var(--solarized-blue) !important; color: var(--solarized-base3) !important; border: 1px solid var(--solarized-cyan) !important; border-radius: 3px; font-weight: 500; transition: all 0.2s ease; } button:hover { background: var(--solarized-cyan) !important; } code, pre { background: var(--solarized-base03) !important; color: var(--solarized-green) !important; border: 1px solid var(--solarized-base01); } .text-red-600 { color: var(--solarized-red) !important; } .text-green-600 { color: var(--solarized-green) !important; } .text-yellow-600 { color: var(--solarized-yellow) !important; }

config.title: Solarized Arc
config.customCss: :root { --solarized-base03: #002b36; --solarized-base02: #073642; --solarized-base01: #586e75; --solarized-base00: #657b83; --solarized-base0: #839496; --solarized-base1: #93a1a1; --solarized-base2: #eee8d5; --solarized-base3: #fdf6e3; --solarized-blue: #268bd2; --solarized-cyan: #2aa198; --solarized-green: #859900; --solarized-yellow: #b58900; --solarized-orange: #cb4b16; --solarized-red: #dc322f; --solarized-magenta: #d33682; --solarized-violet: #6c71c4; } body { background: var(--solarized-base03) !important; color: var(--solarized-base0) !important; font-family: 'Source Code Pro', monospace; line-height: 1.6; } .bg-white, [data-testid='thread-content'] { background: var(--solarized-base02) !important; border: 1px solid var(--solarized-base01); border-radius: 4px; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); } .text-gray-900, .text-black { color: var(--solarized-base1) !important; } .text-gray-600, .text-gray-500 { color: var(--solarized-base00) !important; } .border-gray-200, .border-gray-300 { border-color: var(--solarized-base01) !important; } .hover\:bg-gray-50:hover, .hover\:bg-gray-100:hover { background: var(--solarized-base02) !important; } a, .text-blue-600 { color: var(--solarized-blue) !important; } button { background: var(--solarized-blue) !important; color: var(--solarized-base3) !important; border: 1px solid var(--solarized-cyan) !important; border-radius: 3px; font-weight: 500; transition: all 0.2s ease; } button:hover { background: var(--solarized-cyan) !important; } code, pre { background: var(--solarized-base03) !important; color: var(--solarized-green) !important; border: 1px solid var(--solarized-base01); } .text-red-600 { color: var(--solarized-red) !important; } .text-green-600 { color: var(--solarized-green) !important; } .text-yellow-600 { color: var(--solarized-yellow) !important; }
